explains: n. （名人的）亲笔签名；（作家或音乐家的）手稿，真迹；笔迹，字迹
adj. 亲笔的；（画，雕塑）真迹的

sentences.en: He went backstage and asked for her autograph.
sentences.cn: 他到后台去要她的签名。

sentences.en: Rock stars have to get used to being plagued by autograph hunters.
sentences.cn: 摇滚歌星必须习惯歌迷要求签名的纠缠。

sentences.en: I'd like to have her autograph.
